Can anyone confirm if the PDK exploit regarding the third level feat of "fear" with a negative STR modifier still works under community patch 1.71?

Last week I wanted to go on with my Bard / PDK but found that it didn't work anymore. 
After a search through the patchnotes of 1.71 and even 1.70 I wasn't able to find any information about this. 

--> So: Is my game somehow bugged or was the PDK feat "fear" somehow fixed?

I know this is a power-building guild where a PDK is somewhat out of focus, but I hoped someone could give me some insight.

Thanks guys!
